#Sunflower
library(tidyverse)
n <- 500
tibble(r=sqrt(1:n),
       t=(1:n)*pi*(3-sqrt(5))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=r*cos(t), y=r*sin(t)))+
  geom_point(aes(size=(n-r), color = r),
             shape=16) + 
  coord_equal() +
  cowplot::theme_nothing()
